item.title: CVE-2024-30460|2024-03-29T16:32:53.226Z -- Tumult Inc -- Tumult Hype Animations
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tumult Inc Tumult Hype Animations.This issue affects Tumult Hype Animations: from n/a through 1.9.11.
